translation.title: Tautology
translation.headline: Application determines whether the given formula is a tautology
translation.notice1: Note: To avoid errors in the interpretation of the formula, negation should be placed in parentheses e.g. (!p) or (!(p>q)).
translation.notice2: Note: The application does not check the correctness of the formula.
translation.table-info: Green rows indicate valuations for which the formula is true.
